dmca.title: Author Complains that Google-Enhancing Tips Copied (#2)
dmca.body:
SENT BY: [Private];

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
USA
Fax: [Private]

Dear Google,

Copyright Infringement Notification

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.google.com/search?num=l00&hl=en&lr=lang_en&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF8&newwindow=l&c2coff=1&q=Google+Optimization+Tips

2. Identify the material that YOU claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.

Search Query: "Google Optimization Tips"
Infringing Web Pages: http:/www.google.com/search?num=100&hl=en&lr=lang_en&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&newwindow=l&c2coff=l&q=Google+Optimization+Tips

The infringing page is at:
www.website-promotion-ranking-services.com/articles/google.htm (It redirects to http://www.tech-weblog.biz/how-tol/google-optimization-tips/google-optimization-tips.php.bak, which also includes AdSense ads)

The original page, which contains my name and a link to the article's original publication in a print publication is at: crm9ll.com/seo/google-tips.shtmi 
Original print URL (June 2003): http://www.apcmag.com/apc/v3.nsf/0/Al9F985DCD8BFDCCA256D44001A3A899

[WEBPAGE IMAGE DELETED]

My Page:
First Paragraph below
Few will disagree that Google is the definitive
search engine (SE) with no close competitor.
Given that inclusion is free, your Web pages must
be in it. We'll show you how to hit the Google
SERPs, that is, be seen at the top of the search
engine results pages. These techniques are
known as search engine optimisation (SEO) and
require a small investment of your time.

Infringing Page

First Paragraph below
Google ist the definitive search engine (SE) with no close competitor. Given that inclusion is free, your Web pages must be in it. We'll show you how to hit the Google SERPs, that is, be seen at the top of the search engine results pages. These techniques are known as search engine optimisation (SEO) and require a small investment of your time.

You will note that he has now condensed the copied page to 3 paragraphs, leaving enough text to attract topical Adsense ads - this irritates me more than the plagiarism.

3. My contact email is [Private]

4. The owner of the infringing site appears to be:

[Private], [Private]
[Private], Vienna 1220, AUSTRIA
Telephone [Private]

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner.

7. I use the name "[Private]" on Webmasterworld.

Please note: This is a separate notification to one I submitted recently in respect of another domain owned by the same person, which was allocated the number [#5621112 and #5804284] and closed.

[Private], [Private], Werribe VIC, AUSTRALIA, 27 December 2003
	[Private] DMCA Complaint Page 2 of 2
